p:
In this work, we considered a 6-dimensional multivariate time series, with each Y
t representing a vector ( Z 1 t , Z 2 t , C 1 t , C 2 t , D 1 t , D 2 t ), where Z, D, and C denotes Zika, chikungunya and dengue respectively, the indices 1 and 2 stand for confirmed and discarded cases, and the time t ranges from the first week of 2015 until the last week of 2017.
